actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to establish the Gates of the Arctic National Park in the State of Alaska, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Establishes the Gates of the Arctic National Park in the State of Alaska. Authorizes the appropriation of such sums as may be necessary to carry out the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to establish the Gates of the Arctic National Park in the State of Alaska, and for other purposes.
